description: Enjoy excellent fish and seafood cuisine in this modern restaurant with three floors, including a beautiful terrace for cocktails and an outdoor area on the top floor for aperitifs. The small wine list has a regional focus, and we recommend leaving space for dessert – you won’t regret it!
